entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
“Become antifragile or die” - Taleb Nassim

  • Who am I?

I am Mohd Safwan, an undergraduate student at IIT Bombay, and a Computer Vision Engineer at Augle AI. My interests are Deep Learning and Computer Vision. Reach out to me at safwaniitb@gmail.com or connect with me at LinkedIn. Know more about me here.

  • Projects

Projects are good things, perhaps the best of things. In my experience, no good project ever gets completed. Here is a non-exhaustive list of projects I own or have contributed to. Apart from this, have a look at my GitHub. You can find a short (probably outdated) Resume here.

  • Blog

This is my blog where I try to summarize my thoughts about all kinds of things. Having started recently, I will try to write more often.

Apart from this, have a look at my GitHub. You can find a short (probably outdated) Resume here. Blog This is my blog where I try to summarize my thoughts about all kinds of things.
